DOC.brief_summary: STUDY OBJECTIVES : 1 . To evaluate effectiveness around clock ( OTC ) IV ibuprofen ( 8 dos ) decrease pain orthopedic trauma patient fracture extremity , face , pelvis and/or rib compare patient receive medication . 2 . To evaluate effectiveness around clock ( OTC ) IV ibuprofen ( 8 dos ) decrease use opioid analgesic among orthopedic trauma patient fracture extremity , face , pelvis , and/or rib compare compare patient receive medication .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Efficacy IV Ibuprofen Treatment Pain Orthopedic Trauma Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Trauma patient admit Trauma ICU Trauma StepDown Units . 2 . Fracture rib , face , extremity and/or pelvis 3 . Age 18 75 year old 4 . Adequate IV access 5 . Able self report communicate pain severity 1 . History allergy hypersensitivity component IV Ibuprofen , aspirin ( aspirin relate product ) NSAIDs , COX2 inhibitors 2 . Any intracranial spinal cord trauma 3 . History clinically significant bleed disorder include ITP , DIC platelet dysfunction 4 . Recent history intracranial surgery stroke ( within past 30 day ) 5 . History ulcer , gastritis previous GI bleed 6 . Renal Impairment ( Creatinine > 3.0 mg/dL ) 7 . Pregnant breastfeed 8 . Otherwise unsuitable opinion treat physician time randomization .
DOC.keyword: Assessing efficacy IV Ibuprofen Treatment Pain Orthopedic Trauma Patients
